author: craigmcc
msg: Add a build.xml created by "maven ant" (and after de-absoluting the paths
that are supposed to be relative) in preparation for running nightly builds
for "benchmark".  Unfortunately, the unit tests fail ("Not meeting minimum TPS"
from test case testTransactionsPerSecond), which fails the entire build, so
I can't start posting nightly builds yet, until this is corrected.
For reference, "ant clean dist" needs to succeed for the nightly builds

author: randyk
msg: remove overridden MakeMaker MOD_INSTALL macro, so 3rd party
modules will use MakeMaker's MOD_INSTALL, rather than invoking
